Text.Value: I saw you with Minsc in the Counting House - what happened?
*The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*

EditorData.logicalname: DOESN'T KNOW ANSWER - DELETE IF NOT NEEDED

Text.Value: How do I save the city?

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: I was really stuck for what you should be able to ask Jaheira for an answer to that she couldn't help with or have an opinion on...

Text.Value: What should I tell your family?

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Hoping this covers her dying either in Haven, Moonrise, vs Doppels or against Minsc
Specific to DU ending of accept Bhaal - Handwaving it with Bhaal chosen to cover edge case of them leaving the party dead after the Orin fight and never confronting the player

Text.Value: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

EditorData.NodeContext: Usual Speak with Dead breathiness, but short, sudden burst of amusement

Text.Value: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

Synopsis: Jaheira's Speak with Dead - to try and hit her major beats
